function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient ventilation systems contributing to the spread of covid-19 and other respiratory infections","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission in enclosed spaces may occur due to covid-19, leading to increased risk of transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of infection in confined spaces such as offices, residential areas, and public buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper implementation of hvac systems leading to increased risk of viral transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced ventilation rate due to decreased occupancy density leading to higher risk of infection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to the buildup of airborne contaminants","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper ventilation maintenance leading to reduced effectiveness of ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No evidence that air purifiers alone effectively reduce covid-19 transmission, potential false sense of security.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of ventilation performance and infection risk based on window opening rates, locations, and weather conditions.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced ventilation rates for single-sided ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infection likelihood exceeding 1% with exposure time exceeding 2 hours","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased power consumption with air conditioner operated at 15% window opening ratio","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly ventilated indoor areas increase the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Activities with increased particle emission raise the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixing of contaminated and clean air in hybrid ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate separation of heat and contaminants in displacement ventilation systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient wind-driven ventilation leading to stagnant air and poor air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality iaq","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation rates for controlling infection probability","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on mechanical ventilation systems for indoor air quality control","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments due to inadequate ventilation and overcrowding","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air stagnation in confined spaces with high patient exhaled airborne viral loads","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution due to lockdown measures","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on open windows for high ventilation rates","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air quality leading to the ingress of pollutants into the indoor environment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and accumulation of airborne pathogens","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air not effectively removed","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization of air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate distribution of treated air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear effectiveness of air purification technology","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse or improper maintenance of uvgi technology","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv radiation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of uvc radiation due to virus concealment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ineffective air filters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper installation of air filters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air filters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of hepa filters and pre-filters in built environments","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of electrostatic smoke precipitators esp and electrostatic air filters es in built environments","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate review of construction, design, and maintenance of hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air supply in buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration due to low merv filters","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, and ionizers","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tuberculosis in a hospital ward","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uv lights and ionizers in preventing tb transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with prolonged exposure to uv lights and negative ionizers","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Expense of negative-pressure mechanical ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exhaust vents positioned in the lower part of the room may lead to air contamination and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wire mesh floors in animal cages may not effectively prevent faecal-oral transmission of tb.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"}]}
